mapper.select: SELECT t_name , t_realP , t_addr1 , t_addr2 , t_etc FROM trainer WHERE t_no = #{t_no}
SELECT p_no , t_no , m_qr , p_kg , p_bone , p_fat , p_comment FROM pt WHERE t_no = #{t_no} AND p_no = #{p_no} AND m_qr = #{m_qr}

SELECT e.e_no , e.p_no , e.r_no , e.t_no , e.m_qr , e.e_name , e.e_set , e.e_cnt , e.e_kg , e.e_time , e.e_part , e.e_rest , (SELECT r_ct FROM round WHERE m_qr = e.m_qr AND e.p_no = p_no AND t_no = e.t_no AND r_no = e.r_no) AS r_ct , (SELECT r_date FROM round WHERE m_qr = e.m_qr AND e.p_no = p_no AND t_no = e.t_no AND r_no = e.r_no) AS r_date FROM exercise e WHERE e.t_no = #{t_no} AND e.r_no = #{r_no} AND e.p_no = #{p_no} AND e.m_qr = #{m_qr}
